001package net.tvburger.jdl.datasets;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.model.DataSet;
004
005import java.io.IOException;
006import java.util.Arrays;
007
008public final class MnistDataSets {
009
010    private MnistDataSets() {
011    }
012
013    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
014    public static DataSet<Float> loadDigits() throws IOException {
015        MnistReader.MnistData mnistData = MnistReader.readImagesLabels(
016                "mnist/train-images.idx3-ubyte",
017                "mnist/train-labels.idx1-ubyte");
018        DataSet.Sample<Float>[] samples = new DataSet.Sample[mnistData.images.size()];
019        for (int i = 0; i < samples.length; i++) {
020            samples[i] = DataSet.Sample.of(
021                    imageToFloatFeatures(mnistData.images.get(i)),
022                    labelToFloatOutputs(mnistData.labels[i]));
023        }
024        return DataSet.of(samples);
025    }
026
027    private static Float[] imageToFloatFeatures(int[] imagePixels) {
028        Float[] features = new Float[imagePixels.length];
029        for (int i = 0; i < imagePixels.length; i++) {
030            features[i] = imagePixels[i] / 255.0f;
031        }
032        return features;
033    }
034
035    private static Float[] labelToFloatOutputs(byte label) {
036        Float[] outputs = new Float[10];
037        Arrays.fill(outputs, 0.0f);
038        outputs[label] = 1.0f;
039        return outputs;
040    }
041
042}
